name: 高得畬
objective:
This course will follow the course of ”Introduction of VLSI Design”(course number 115036) and cover following interesting topics:
Memory / Sequency Circuit Design
ALU Design
Floorplan (P&R) for the VLSI
VLSI System Architecture
Real chip examples
Please check the classnotes at:
http://www.cc.ntut.edu.tw/~dkao/
